The Process

How ZephyrSign Works

Three simple steps to silent, legally-binding digital agreements. Our patent-pending Invisible Signature Recognition‚Ñ¢ analyzes your unique gestural fingerprint.

Upload Your Document

Drag and drop any PDF, DOCX, or interpretive dance notation file (.idn) into the ZephyrSign portal. Our system converts it to Mime-Readable Format (MRF).

Perform Your Invisible Signature

Using your webcam, execute the signing gesture you registered during onboarding. Our AI analyzes 847 micro-movements in your invisible pen stroke. Please ensure your room is adequately silent ‚Äî ambient noise above 12dB will trigger a security lockout.

Receive Confirmation

Your signed document is sealed with a ZephyrSign Silence Certificate‚Ñ¢ and delivered to all parties.
